properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 9:26AM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
At 925 AM EST, an area of heavy snow with possible embedded
thundersnow was located 8 miles southeast of Gowanda, or 14 miles
northwest of Salamanca, moving southeast at 40 mph.

Locations impacted include...
Olean, Fredonia, Salamanca, Wellsville, Allegany State Park, Gowanda,
Ashford, Allegany, Franklinville, Cuba, Weston Mills, St.
Bonaventure, Ashford Hollow, Whitesville, Hinsdale, Friendship, Great
Valley, New Albion, Dayton and Scio.

This includes Interstate 86 between exits 19 and 29.

Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a quarter of a mile in
this area of heavy snow.

Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this dangerous
area of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially
slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying
travel until the heavier snow passes your location.

Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be
prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra
time when traveling.

NWSheadline: AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT CATTARAUGUS...NORTHEASTERN CHAUTAUQUA AND SOUTHERN ALLEGANY COUNTIES
